email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Oceanic Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.75 per ton). Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider a rate in the high 40s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $49.50 per ton. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.50 sounds reasonable. However, can we push the laycan to 18-23 October? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s readiness and any additional terms? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the adjusted laycan of 18-23 October works for us. The MV Oceanic Star is currently in Singapore and will be ready for loading by the 18th. Attached are the full terms for your review. Let me know if you need any further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. The terms look good. Let’s proceed with the freight rate of $49.50 and the laycan of 18-23 October. Please send over the final contract for signing. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll prepare the final contract and send it over shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah
